validationErrors.firstNameMax: First name must be at most 50 characters

validationErrors.subjectMax: Subject must be at most 100 characters

validationErrors.messageMax: Message must be at most 2000 characters

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

forgotPassword.instructions: Enter your email to receive password reset instructions.
forgotPassword.confirmationMessage: If an account with that email exists, you will receive password reset instructions.

errors.resetFailed: Failed to reset password. The link may have expired.
